mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_telephone, user_email, user_gender, user_birthdate, user_address, user_image, user_nickname, user_sns) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birthdate}, #{address}, #{image}, #{nickname}, #{sns})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET user_password = #{password}, user_telephone = #{telephone}, user_email = #{email}, user_address = #{address}, user_image = #{image}, user_nickname = #{nickname} WHERE user_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, user_password, user_telephone, user_email, user_gender, user_birthdate, user_address, user_image, user_nickname, user_sns FROM user_info WHERE user_id = #{id}

SELECT A.user_id, A.user_name, A.user_password, A.user_telephone, A.user_email, A.user_gender, A.user_birthdate, A.user_address, A.user_image, A.user_nickname, A.user_sns FROM user_info A, user_follow B WHERE A.user_id = #{id} AND A.user_id = B.followee_id
